meanings.definition: The state of not being available.
meanings.sent1: The nonavailabilities of the tickets disappointed many fans.
meanings.sent2: The nonavailabilities of parking spaces made it difficult to find a spot.
meanings.sent3: The nonavailabilities of snacks at the party led to a hungry crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her nonavailabilities in answering the phone made her seem distant.
meanings.sent5: The nonavailabilities of sunshine on a rainy day made the weather gloomy.

meanings.sent1: The nonavailabilities of the product caused frustration among customers.
meanings.sent2: The nonavailabilities of time made it hard to schedule a meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonavailabilities of Wi-Fi at the cafe made people talk to each other more.
meanings.sent4: His nonavailabilities in attending events made him miss out on social gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The nonavailabilities of fresh produce in winter made cooking challenging.
